summary: A sci-fi/thriller story centered on a special-ops team that is dispatched to fight supernatural beings.
cast: James Badge Dale|Emily Mortimer|Bruce Greenwood|Max Martini|Cory Hardrict|Clayne Crawford|Gonzalo Menendez|Ursula Parker|Aaron Serban|Dylan Smith|Louis Ozawa|Jimmy Akingbola|Ryan Robbins|Stephen Root|Philip Bulcock|Royce Pierreson|Declan Hannigan|Mark O'Neal|Mike Bodie|Peter Schueller|Zoltan Teglas|Geoffrey Thomas|Thomas Kelly|Zalan Sipos|Tsogbaatar Batzorig|Miklós Bányai|Brian Caspe|Peter J. Chaffey|James D. Dever|Zoltan Lörincz|Tsogtsaikan Narantsogt|Zoli Teglas|Filip Watermann|András Ábel
title: Spectral
